steps.details: BESCOM to identify all feeders and estimate customer impact across Whitefield and Mahadevapura.
Send relay and transformer specialists to assess relay trip cause and initiate repairs.
Ensure hospitals and emergency services have uninterrupted power via alternate feeds/generators.
Publicly publish affected areas and restoration ETA; set up helpdesk for complaints.
If restoration is delayed, coordinate controlled load-shedding to stabilize the grid.
Position traffic marshals at major junctions to manage flow and prioritize arterials.
Request temporary power solutions (generators/UPS) for critical traffic infrastructure.
BMTC to reroute buses away from the most affected junctions to maintain schedule integrity.
Use traffic portals and radio to inform commuters about delays and alternate routes.
Police to enforce lane discipline and clear obstructions to reduce queue formation.

plan.plan_title: Metro Frequency Reduced on KR Puram–Whitefield

steps.details: BMRCL to operate short-shuttle services to maintain connectivity on affected stretch.
Deploy platform staff and police at KR Puram and Whitefield to control boarding and queuing.
Work with BESCOM to prioritise auxiliary feeds for metro traction power and signalling.
Arrange additional BMTC buses and ride-hailing coordination to absorb stranded passengers.
SCADA and operations teams to monitor auxiliary power stability and update service bulletins.
